mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY INDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(MEMID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES(#{memID}, #{title},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, WRITER = #{writer} WHERE IDX=#{idx}
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE IDX = #{idx}
